Title: Prohibits the use of algorithmic systems to artificially inflate the price or reduce the supply of leased or rented residential dwelling units
Summary: Prohibits the collecting of information of historical or contemporaneous prices, supply levels, or lease or rental contract termination and renewal dates of residential dwelling units from two or more rental property owners for purposes of analyzing or processing of such information using an algorithm and of recommending rental prices, lease renewal terms, or ideal occupancy levels to a rental property owner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting the use of algorithmic systems to artificially inflate the price or reduce the supply of leased or rented residential dwelling units in the state
